ch.zhaw.ba10_bsha_1.ime
Class PadView

java.lang.Object
  KeyboardView
      ch.zhaw.ba10_bsha_1.ime.PadView
All Implemented Interfaces:
IObservable
public class PadView
extends KeyboardView
implements IObservable

Implementation of a KeyboardView to gather data for the DetectionService. Notifies its IObservers on input events such as new TouchInputs, crossing out of existing TouchInputs (seen as a backspace) or starting of new TouchInputs with a certain offset (seen as a space).
